name: Sorgina: A Tale of Witches
description: A dark evil from the past broke free during the last council of witches. Help a young apprentice in her quest to lift a terrible curse off her sisters and dispel the shadows. Use your powers and wit to overcome every challenge in this family friendly 3D puzzle-platformer based on Basque mythology.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GT 220 1GB / AMD Radeon HD 6450 1GB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 10 GB available space Sound Card: Directx 9.0c compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: 10 Processor: Intel i5 2500K Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 560Ti DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 10 GB available space Sound Card: Directx 9.0c compatible
